description: The image API already was deprecated after 2.35, due to it is proxy API to glance. But the sub-resource image-metadata of image was forgotten to deprecate.
title: Image Metadata API wasn't deprecated after 2.35

comments.content: The image API already was deprecated after 2.35, due to it is proxy API to glance. But the sub-resource image-metadata of image was forgotten to deprecate.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content: I think this needs to be a spec and new microversion for Ocata, similar to os-interfaces and os-virtual-interfaces.

comments.content: The decision on this was to do it in a new microversion and with a spec in ocata.

comments.content:
I've created an Ocata blueprint placeholder for this:

https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/deprecate-image-meta-proxy-api

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/405461
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=df6e2d37f2c4b4c4dcccf870bc236ca5adc7770e
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit df6e2d37f2c4b4c4dcccf870bc236ca5adc7770e
Author: Pavel Kholkin <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Dec 1 18:37:28 2016 +0300

    [proxy-api] microversion 2.39 deprecates image-metadata proxy API
    
    Almost all proxy APIs were deprecated in microversion 2.36.
    But the sub-resource image-metadata of image was forgotten to deprecate.
    This patch deprecates the image-metdata API from 2.39.
    
    Implements blueprint deprecate-image-meta-proxy-api
    Closes-bug: #1614578
    
    Change-Id: I5507337ab6fe4a377f66dec3fe275d75618cd7b4
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 15.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
